title: Traditional Pecan Pie in a Jar

Ingredients.1: 2 cups pecan halves, broken into coarse pieces

Ingredients.9: 8  half pint canning jars with lids and rings

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spread pecans on a baking sheet.

Directions.2: Bake pecans in the preheated oven until lightly toasted, 6 to 8 minutes. Cool to room temperature.

Directions.3: Bring sugar, light corn syrup, and dark corn syrup to a boil in a saucepan; boil for 2 minutes. Remove from heat and cool slightly, about 10 minutes.

Directions.4: Whisk eggs in a large bowl until frothy. Add syrup mixture slowly, whisking constantly to prevent eggs from curdling. Whisk in butter, vanilla extract, and salt until batter is smooth.

Directions.5: Spray 8 small jars with cooking spray. Press pieces of pie crust dough into bottom and sides of jars. Add a layer of toasted pecans to each jar. Spoon in batter, leaving 1/4 inch rim at top.

Directions.6: Bake in preheated oven until darkened on the top, about 40 minutes. Cool to room temperature before serving.
